means: 有可能，或有条件完成的
使能够，提供做…的权利[措施]( enable的现在分词 )

sentence.Network_en: Some protection for victims must be written into the enabling legislation.
sentence.Network_cn: 对受害者的一些保护必须写进权力授予法。

sentence.Network_en: Researchers describe it as an enabling technology.
sentence.Network_cn: 研究者们将其描述成一种实现性技术。

sentence.Network_en: He received a laissez - passer enabling him to leave the country.
sentence.Network_cn: 他获得了一张护照使他能离开这国家.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 赋能（Enabling），用现代网络语言，也就是“给力”，“geilivable”,使之具有能力。海洋生物技术就是这种“给力”的关键技术。

list.abs: the ultra static sound chassis establishment , enables you calmly toenjoy the movement ., 超静音的车体设置 , 使您静享运动.
cisco&nbsp;2950&nbsp;配置命令_wxtblog2009... ... #hostname 主机名 #enable password 口令 #enable secret 口令.
本项用来允许(Enabled)还是禁止（Disabled)使用主板上集成软盘驱动器控制器。Onboad FDC Swap A & B本项用来选择否交换A、B …
电器电子词汇英语翻译(A-G) ... enable 充讦操作 enable pulse 启动脉冲 enabling pulse 启动脉冲.

entry.def: If someone or something enables you to do a particular thing, they give you the opportunity to do it.

example.ex: The new test should enable doctors to detect the disease early.
example.tran: 新的检测手段应该能够使医生们尽早查出这种疾病。

example.ex: ...a new charter for training to enable young people to make the most of their potential.
example.tran: 能够使年轻人充分发挥潜能的新培训规章

entry.def: To enable something to happen means to make it possible for it to happen.

example.ex: The hot sun enables the grapes to reach optimum ripeness...
example.tran: 炙热的阳光使葡萄能够达到最佳成熟状态。

example.ex: A series of holes in the side panels enables the position of the shelves to be adjusted...
example.tran: 通过侧板上的一系列小孔可以对隔板位置进行调整。

entry.def: To enable someone to do something means to give them permission or the right to do it.

example.ex: The republic's legislation enables young people to do a form of alternative service.
example.tran: 共和国的法律允许年轻人服某种形式的替代役。

auth_sentence.content: We are definitely in an enabling relationship with chocolate.
auth_sentence.res_content: We are definitely in an enabling relationship with chocolate.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: We are definitely in an enabling relationship with chocolate.

auth_sentence.content: What we're really talking about is enabling people.
auth_sentence.res_content: What we're really talking about is enabling people.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: What we're really talking about is enabling people.

auth_sentence.content: Our collective efforts are enabling a greener more sustainable future.
auth_sentence.res_content: Our collective efforts are enabling a greener more sustainable future.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Our collective efforts are enabling a greener more sustainable future.
